name: Sword of Legacy MMORPG 2D
description:
A little game made during covid 19 by two friends who wanted to offer a cute little MMORPG that was simple to play, we have only made one version for android at the moment, but we hope to release the iOS version soon.

Come, enter the fabulous world of Lucrezia! A thrilling adventure awaits you. You will fight monsters, face numerous players, travel the world on foot or on the back of magnificent mounts. 
Up to 100 levels are waiting for you to become the best!

Come have fun, relax with friends in this wonderful adventure.

See you soon on the game!


Don't hesitate to give your suggestions !
